amendment.description: To provide for a report on the establishment of a Deputy Secretary of Defense for Management.

action.text: Amendment SA 2442 proposed by Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S12483-12485, S12492-12493) To provide for a report on the establishment of a Deputy Secretary of Defense for Management.
